/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++0x    CMakeFiles/irrbullet.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/irrbullet.dir/CEngine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/irrbullet.dir/CPhysics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/irrbullet.dir/CGame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/irrbullet.dir/CEntity.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/irrbullet -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_system -Wl,-Bdynamic /usr/local/lib/libIrrlicht.a -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext /usr/local/lib/libBulletDynamics.so /usr/local/lib/libBulletCollision.so /usr/local/lib/libLinearMath.so /usr/local/lib/libBulletSoftBody.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
